basic_info.author: Gary Gregory
basic_info.message:
CSVParser.getRecords() knows how to use CSVFormat's maxRows

CSVParser.stream() knows how to use CSVFormat's maxRows
basic_info.message_subject: CSVParser.getRecords() knows how to use CSVFormat's maxRows
